name: Polaroid (p0tatostudio)
description:
Polaroid is a puzzle-solving game with a light-horror theme. In this game, players need to investigate the story behind an abandoned factory. The core mechanic of the game is a magical polaroid which allows players to teleport to the place in a photo, or to reset objects in a photo.
